titles.title: Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 202) providing for the expenses of certain committees of the House of Representatives in the One Hundred Tenth Congress.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-34, by Ms. Slaughter.

The amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on House Administration now printed in the resolution, modified by the amendment printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution, shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 22.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 219.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 195 (Roll no. 127).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/8/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.Res. 202 (House committee funding).
